name: Dato Dr. Nik Ramlah Nik Mahmood
position: Chairman, Board Nomination and Remuneration Committee
description: Retired as Deputy Chief Executive of Securities Commission Malaysia (“SC”) in March 2016, having served the organisation for 23 years. Extensive experience in policy and regulatory reform, capital market regulation, corporate governance and Islamic finance. Prior to joining the SC, she was an Associate Professor at the Faculty of Law, University of Malaya.

name: Dato' Mohd Izzaddin Idris
position: Non-Independent Non-Executive Director (Nominee of Axiata Group Berhad)
